meanings.definition: A taxonomic category ranking below phylum and above class.
meanings.sent1: The biology textbook explained the concept of subphyla in a simple way.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study different subphyla to understand the diversity of life forms.
meanings.sent3: The subphyla at the zoo decided to have a party to celebrate their classification.
meanings.sent4: In the tree of life, subphyla are like branches that connect larger groups.
meanings.sent5: Learning about subphyla helps us organize and categorize living organisms.

meanings.definition: A group of related organisms within a phylum.
meanings.sent1: The marine biologist identified a new subphyla of sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: Each subphyla has unique characteristics that distinguish it from others.
meanings.sent3: The subphyla in the forest had a friendly competition to see who could grow the tallest.
meanings.sent4: Just like a family, subphyla share common traits and features.
meanings.sent5: Exploring different subphyla reveals the fascinating diversity of life on Earth.
